title: 怎么关掉这恶心的生物加速
author: 炽寒苦力怕
txt_content:
就是，如题，加了怪物云集和僵尸启示录，生物就会给一个加速buff，怎么关掉？npc和僵尸跑来跑去的看着我眼花缭乱的。。。。。。如图，就是以下这种场景。






file_1584877587000.jpg
(286.31 KB, 下载次数: 0)




下载附件


2020-3-22 19:46 上传








跑来跑去的僵尸和npc

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
炽寒苦力怕 发表于 2020-3-25 10:33
不行啊，关掉之后只有友好npc不闪现了，敌对npc还是闪来闪去。我记得在怪物云集还是启示录里看到了一条： ...general {
    # If set to True, all swarming mobs will burn in daylight. (useful to get rid of creepers after a night)
    B:"All Mobs Burn"=false
       是否所有怪物到了白天都燃烧
    # If set to True, mobs will be occasionally aggresive towards animals.
    B:"Attack Animals"=false
       怪物是否会攻击中立生物
    # If Set to True, creepers will explode by themselves if they get bored (stay in place for too long)
    B:"Creepers Explode By Themselves"=false
       苦力怕无聊时是否会自动爆炸
    # How many days until monsters begin to swarm at night. Default is 8 - which is every full moon.
    I:"Days Until Swarm"=8
       多少天一次云集
    # If set to True, monsters will be able to build bridges and staircases to get higher up
    B:"Enable Building"=true
    # If set to True, monsters will be able to digg through walls during swarm
       怪物是否会搭桥
    B:"Enable Digging"=true
    # If set to True, skeletons will occasionaly shoot a rocket at you from distance (like a mortar strike)
    B:"Enable Rockets"=false
       骷髅是否会发射爆裂箭
    # If set to True, monsters digging will play an indicating sound (this is server side config)
    B:"Enable Sounds"=true
    # If set to True, monsters will occasionally sprint when you sprint
       怪物是否会跟着你冲刺
    B:"Enable Sprinting"=true
    # If set to true - monsters will swarm every night after X days. If false - they ill swarm periodically. (every X days)
    B:"Swarm Every Night"=false
       怪物是否每晚云集
}
复制代码

#WARNING: Do not change value of 'isModpack'
#Fri May 10 19:26:58 CST 2019
#是否为战场模式
isBattlegrounds=false
#关闭自定义玩家列表[TAB]
disableCustomPlayerList=false
#不知道是什么
hasSeenOptionsDisclaimer=false
#启用旧版GUI[类似原版的血量显示之类的]推荐启用，因为默认的有些人看不清
enableOldGui=true
#关闭更新
disableUpdates=true
#允许寻常的怪物生成[只对单人生效]
allowVanillaMonsters=false
#关闭自定义主界面[MOD自带的主界面](推荐不要关闭，因为关掉后没法连接官服)
disableCustomMainMenu=false
#是MODpack?
isModpack=false
#允许Discord什么的
enableDiscordRP=false
#禁用默认材质包
disableDefaultResourcePack=true复制代码

貌似就是怪物云集里的，实在不行就删掉吧

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
怪物云集里的config
# If set to True, monsters will occasionally sprint when you sprint
       怪物是否会跟着你冲刺
    B:"Enable Sprinting"=true复制代码

replies.author: 炽寒苦力怕
replies.txt_content:
御炎Roinflam 发表于 2020-3-22 20:07
怪物云集里的config
不行啊，关掉之后只有友好npc不闪现了，敌对npc还是闪来闪去。我记得在怪物云集还是启示录里看到了一条：“会赋予怪物buff，如加速”

replies.author: 炽寒苦力怕
replies.txt_content:
御炎Roinflam 发表于 2020-3-25 10:35
貌似就是怪物云集里的，实在不行就删掉吧
好吧，这可能是mod自带机制，我就删了吧，还是给你一个最佳，谢谢帮忙
